message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I estimate its true worth to be around $800,000 to you. However, I am willing to extend a special offer to you today. If you decide to purchase this product, I would like to propose a price of $750,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty on all components. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your positive response.
